alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 2:27PM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow Showers linger this evening. Additional snow accumulations of a coating to 1 inch. * WHERE...Mainly near and north of the Massachusetts Turnpike and away from the immediate coast. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Snow showers will linger into this evening before dissipating by late evening and especially after midnight. Roadways were mainly wet at mid-afternoon...but temperatures will drop a few degrees this evening. This may allow for some slippery spots to develop on untreated roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
